en_text: Can I leave once they do?
jp_text: うん… 決着したら帰っていい？
google_translated: Yeah ... Can I return if I settle down?

en_text: There's still another semifinal game. i can't help but laugh
jp_text: 準決勝は もう１試合あるだろ？
google_translated: Is the semifinals one game anymore?
